item.title: Vision Statement: Managed Sovereignty at 40
item.description:
Vision Statement: Managed Sovereignty at 40

Summary: Desired life state: freelance/home-office work delivering autonomy and enjoyment (food, culture, sensual connection). ‘Age 40 as fine wine’ frames time horizon as buildable, not lost.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 6

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.

item.title: Project Greenhouse: Co-Conspirator Status
item.description:
Project Greenhouse: Co-Conspirator Status

Summary: Fiancée listed as engaged co-conspirator in Project Greenhouse. Signals trust and practical collaboration.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 3–4
